entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning late this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
